data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Hartemita Cameron, 1910 (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Cardiochilinae), with the description of six new species from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Long, Khuat Dang, van Achterberg, Cornelis (2011): Review of the genus Hartemita Cameron, 1910 (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Cardiochilinae), with the description of six new species from Vietnam. ZooKeys 102: 13-40, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.102.879, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.102.879
